009package imagingbook.core.plugin;
010
011import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.TYPE;
012//import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME;
013//import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.SOURCE;
014import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
017import java.lang.annotation.Target;
018
019
020/**
021 * Annotation to specify the menu entry (name) of the associated plugin class.
022 * Takes a {@link String} argument e.g.,
023 * <pre>
024 *  {@literal @}IjMenuEntry("My Grand Plugin")
025 * public class My_Plugin implements PlugIn {
026 *   ...
027 * }</pre>
028 */
029@Retention(RUNTIME)
030@Target(TYPE)
031public @interface IjPluginName {
032        public String value();
033}
